title: Has someone ever got from honor lvl 0 to lvl 1 ?
body: I was looking at the forum and i saw only people which didnt get to honor 1 so is here someone who did it ?

replies.body: There have been lots of players who got unfortunately dropped to Honor 0, but they were still more than able to get back up to higher ranks before the season ended!

A lot of people do, infact I managed to get dishonourable on my smurf and it took me nearly 2 weeks to get it back to level 1!

It's a long punishing wait but it does make you think about your actions within a game are not worth the hassle of re ranking up your honor.
